Memo: The perishable agricultural commodities listed on this invoice are sold subject to the statutory trust authorization by section 5(c) of the Perishable Agricultural Commodities Act. 1930 (7 USC 499e(c)). The seller of these commodities retains a trust claim over these commodities. all inventories of food or other products derived from these commodities, and any receivables or proceeds from the sale of these commodities until full payment is received.
